description.en-us: The Panda Branch Plus is an advanced, all-in-one power management hub designed for sophisticated 3D printing ecosystems. It centralizes control with ten independent, switchable channels (five MX3.0 and five Type-C ports - powered by a robust 24V/2.8A adapter).
description.zh-cn: Panda Branch Plus 是一款先进的一体化电源管理集线器，专为复杂的 3D 打印生态系统而设计。它通过 10 个独立的可切换通道（5 个 MX3.0 端口和 5 个 Type-C 端口，由坚固的 24V/2.8A 适配器供电）实现集中控制。
